scripts.start:debug: rimraf dist && nest build && nest start --debug
scripts.test:e2e:docker: docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml build api && docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml run --rm -it api sh -c "npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run test:e2e"; docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml down
scripts.test:e2e:watch:docker: docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml build api && docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml run --rm -it api sh -c "npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run test:e2e:watch"; docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml down
scripts.test:unit:docker: docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml build api && docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml run --rm -it api sh -c "npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run test:unit"; docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml down
scripts.test:unit:watch:docker: docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml build api && docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml run --rm -it api sh -c "npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run test:unit:watch"; docker-compose -f ./docker/testing/docker-compose.testing.yml down
